title: nArAyaNi sharaNam
sahitya:
nArAyaNi sharaNam tAyE jnAna vANi sharaNam jaya


anupallavi

  ArAdhanai sheyyum anbarkkun arivum kalaiyum tiruvum taruvAi


caraNam 1    maDamai iruLaip-pOkki engaL vAzhvai mangala vINaiyAkki
kaDamaiyAna paNigaL puriyak-kalvi selvam nalgi aruLAi
 caraNam 2    Atral mighavum vaLara uLLE Atma shakti jyOti oLira
vITrirunduLLa malaril emmai vIra dhIra sUrarAkkuvAi
